title: Ebola Prevention Supplies Running Short In Liberia
teaser: Liberia is the country hardest hit by the Ebola virus outbreak. Aid is trickling in, but it is not enough. NPR's Linda Wertheimer speaks to Wall Street Journal reporter Drew Hinshaw in the capital, Monrovia.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
